Text:
function ERU_EP05_14()
    -- .承-5【2月第3週】「アルムとネメシア」
    SaveData.Title = "アルムとネメシア"

    -- //BG：風紀委員室
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG016aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav")

    -- //BU：ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0723.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】通常
 “By the way, Erika, do you know that Nemesia used to be part of a duo idol group?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2339.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 “N-no, that’s the first I’ve heard of it.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Since I was a child, I'd often seen Nemesia-san in dramas and movies, so I mainly thought of her as an actress. ]])

    MSG([[ I never imagined she did similar activities as Hermes-san in the past. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0724.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】通常
 “It’s not well known now, but Nemesia had an older sister named Alum, and the two of them performed as idols. I’ve heard they were quite popular back then.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0725.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】通常
 “However, as you can tell from Nemesia’s current personality, she wasn’t good at the smiles and gestures that please fans. Alum was more popular, apparently.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2340.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 “What kind of person was Alum-san?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0726.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】苦笑
 “She was carefree and free-spirited, somewhat like Hermes. Alum had a natural charisma, always the center of attention. Nemesia was jealous of her sister but respected her even more.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0727.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 “But at the peak of that popularity... Alum fell down a trivial stairway and passed away suddenly.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2341.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】焦り
 “Eh!? W-was it an accident? Or suicide?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0728.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 “That is unknown. It’s presumed to be an accident, but suicide or homicide can’t be ruled out. Some even suspected Nemesia’s involvement.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2342.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 “T-that's just... too sad. She had already lost someone precious, and on top of that, to be suspected without knowing the cause.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ When I lost my sister Marika, I was in a similar situation, so I understand. ]])

    MSG([[ Losing someone precious without any answers. Someone important stays silent. ]])

    MSG([[ I was fortunate to find a key to save my sister at Yuriai Private Academy... but Nemesia had nothing at all. ]])

    MSG([[ That despair is beyond imagining. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0729.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 “Naturally, Nemesia was stunned. Having lost her greatest goal, rival, and beloved sister, she didn’t know what to do.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0730.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】真剣
 “And her anger was directed at the media and fans who quickly forgot Alum.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2343.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 “The media and fans? W-why?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0731.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】真剣
 “You’ve probably never even heard the name Alum, right?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2344.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 “Y-yes. I’ve never seen footage on TV.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0732.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】真剣
 “While Nemesia mourned losing Alum, the world swiftly forgot her.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0733.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】真剣
 “The people who were loudly grieving and shedding tears at Alum’s death were cheering for another idol within a month. The media treats her as a figure of the past, now only occasionally running specials.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0734.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 “‘Beautiful girls’ are only fawned over for a moment. Interest moves elsewhere quickly, Nemesia realized.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0735.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 “And she swore. There must never be another victim like her sister. To prevent girls from being tossed around by the title of ‘beautiful girl,’ one day the Himegami family will seize control of the concept of ‘beauty.’” ]])

    MSG([[ Seizing control of the concept of ‘beauty.’ What a monumental ambition. ]])

    MSG([[ Even if someone ridiculed her as ‘crazy,’ it wouldn’t be strange. ]])

    MSG([[ Normally, it would seem impossible to realize, but I can somewhat understand her feelings. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2345.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 (She must have loved Alum-san that much...) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ It was also losing Marika that first caused me to cross-dress. ]])

    MSG([[ If you lose someone you cherish most. If you know they will never come back. If you can’t fill the void. ]])

    MSG([[ I would. No, surely anyone would. ]])

    MSG([[ They’d take actions they’d never normally think of. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0736.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】通常
 “Then, to achieve her goal, Nemesia aimed to create the ideal ‘beautiful girl’.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2346.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 “Nemesia’s ideal beautiful girl? Why?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0737.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】真剣
 “The ones who define values are always those at the top. By placing her own piece at the top, she could seize control over those values.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0738.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】真剣
 “If Nemesia could manipulate the concept of ‘beautiful girl,’ the number of girls tossed around by that concept could be reduced. She thought she could save girls who admire ‘beautiful girls.’” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2347.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 “Thank you... I think I finally understand Nemesia-san’s goal.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The concept of ‘beautiful girl’ changes continuously, and those praised today are quickly forgotten. ]])

    MSG([[ To prevent those unhappy girls, Nemesia intends to control the concept herself. ]])

    MSG([[ I understood how she came to think this way and how she plans to realize it. ]])

    MSG([[ But one thing still puzzles me. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2348.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】通常
 “Why target Yuriai Private Academy? I don’t see why this school would be aimed at.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0739.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】通常
 “Because the ‘Four Princesses’ system at this academy embodies the ever-changing concept of ‘beautiful girl.’” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2349.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】驚き
 “Huh? The ‘Four Princesses’ system?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0740.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】通常
 “Do you know the names of the princesses before Marika? Or even before that? How about the first student to be called ‘princess’?” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2350.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 “I-I’m sorry... I don’t know at all.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Now that I think about it, the senior ‘princesses’ rarely come up in school conversations. ]])

    MSG([[ I was curious and looked it up a few times but didn’t remember the names. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0741.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】苦笑
 “That’s understandable. They’re the academy’s representative beautiful girls, but once they graduate, their role ends. Unless they remain as princess empresses, they’re quickly forgotten.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0742.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】通常
 “The ‘princess’ system at Yuriai Private Academy is the very symbol of the structure surrounding the ‘beautiful girl’ concept that Nemesia detests.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0743.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】真剣
 “That’s why she targeted this academy as the first step to demolish society’s ‘beautiful girl’ concept. Coeducation is a stepping stone... her true goal is to abolish the ‘princess’ system.” ]])

    MSG([[ Thinking about it, the ‘princess’ system here is indeed a microcosm of society. ]])

    MSG([[ There are ‘beautiful girls.’ Fans each support their favorite. And ‘beautiful girls’ change from year to year. ]])

    MSG([[ For Nemesia, who hates this structure, it is an unforgivable tradition. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0744.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 “Originally... I should have been the one to stop her.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0745.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 “I couldn’t become the ‘beautiful girl’ Nemesia wanted. I tried, but behaving girlishly was painful. There were always flaws in my acting.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0746.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 “As a result, Almeria was brought in as my replacement. The guilt of not meeting expectations and sacrificing Almeria got in the way.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0747.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 “So even when Almeria offered to merge personalities herself, I couldn’t stop her. I wanted to free her from lifelong suffering.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0748.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】真剣
 “Disappearing, such a thing—” ]])

    MSG([[ Tears ran down Daria’s cheek. Without wiping them, she clenched her fists and trembled as she shouted. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0749.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】真剣
 “There’s no way disappearing is happiness! There’s no way repressing your true feelings is happiness! Sacrificing your precious family is acceptable!!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0750.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】悲しみ
 “Please, Erika. Save my precious other little sister... Almeria...!” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2351.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】悲しみ
 “Daria-san.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ At last, I felt as if she had shown me all her inner feelings. ]])

    MSG([[ There’s nothing special. She’s a kind, family-loving, clumsy—and gentle—older sister. ]])

    MSG([[ Looking straight into Daria’s eyes, I replied firmly. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2352.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】真剣
 “I will definitely save her. Both Almeria-san and Hermes-san are my precious friends.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：校舎前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG011aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Then, a week passed. ]])

    MSG([[ While Hermes-san was appealing daily at live shows, all of us supporting Erika worked together steadily, making careful PR efforts. ]])

    MSG([[ Support rates fluctuated around 50%, a battle of advance and retreat. Hermes-san and I were both active without rest all day. It was hard but a passionate fight, burning both body and soul. ]])

    MSG([[ And finally, the day of the Princess Election came— ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP05_15")
end
